sentences.sContent: Bertha thought it disconcerted him by rendering evident even to himself the vacuity of his mind.
sentences.sContent_eng: Bertha thought it disconcerted him by rendering evident even to himself the vacuity of his mind.
sentences.sCn: 伯莎认为这对他不利，这种情况甚至清楚地向他自己证明了他心灵的空虚。

sentences.sContent: "Gossip Girl" reversed course and found a way saucily to make a virtue of vacuity and viciousness.
sentences.sContent_eng: "Gossip Girl" reversed course and found a way saucily to make a virtue of vacuity and viciousness.
sentences.sCn: “绯闻女孩”颠倒是非，用另一种方式填补你的空虚和小邪恶。

sentences.sContent: The space in statuary, which shows the spirit of humanism, has something to do with substance and vacuity, the contrast as well as unity between mankind and nature.
sentences.sContent_eng: The space in statuary, which shows the spirit of humanism, has something to do with substance and vacuity, the contrast as well as unity between mankind and nature.
sentences.sCn: 雕塑空间关系到实体和虚空、人与自然的对立统一，体现了“人本主义”的精神。

synos.tran: 空虚；空白；思想贫乏；无聊之事

words.tran: 空虚的；空的；空缺的；空闲的；茫然的
空的；空虚的；空洞的；无意义的
直愣愣地，没有表情地；空虚地，空地

trans.tranOther: lack of intelligent, interesting, or serious thought
